data.enText: to make sth clearer or easier to understand
data.chText: 使更清晰易懂；阐明；澄清

data.enText: I hope this clarifies my position .
data.chText: 我希望这能阐明我的立场。

data.enText: She asked him to clarify what he meant.
data.chText: 她要他说清楚他是什么意思。

data.enText: to make sth, especially butter, pure by heating it
data.chText: （尤指通过加热使黄油）纯净，净化

data.enText: I am seeking clarification of the regulations.
data.chText: 我正在努力弄清楚这些规则。

simple_means.memory_skill: clar- 清楚 + -ify 动词后缀

means: (尤指通过加热使黄油)纯净，净化

tr: make clear by removing impurities or solids, as by heating

example: clarify the mystery surrounding her death

example.ex: Thank you for writing and allowing me to clarify the present position...
example.tran: 谢谢你的来信，并允许我阐明目前的立场。

example.ex: A bank spokesman was unable to clarify the situation.
example.tran: 一位银行发言人未能把情况解释清楚。

value.def: To clarify something means to make it easier to understand, usually by explaining it in more detail.

example.ex: The union has written to Zurich asking for clarification of the situation.
example.tran: 该联盟已致函苏黎世，要求将情况解释清楚。

partsOfSpeech.dec: simpl(e) 简单的 + -ify 动词后缀
class n.等级 + -ify 动词后缀

just 法律,公正 + -ify 动词后缀
mod 方法,模式 + -ify 动词后缀
pur 纯洁 + -ify 动词后缀
qual 资格 + -ify 动词后缀
ver- 真实 + -ify 动词后缀
rect 直,正 + -ify 动词后缀
magn 大,伟大 + -ify 动词后缀
test 测试,证据 + -ify 动词后缀
terr 使惊吓 + -ify 动词后缀
sign 标记 + -ify 动词后缀
quant- 量,数量 + -ify 动词后缀
cert 确实,确信 + -ify 动词后缀
not 知道 + -ify 动词后缀
ex- 出,出去 + empl- 拿;获得 + -ify 动词后缀
